comments.comment: We should abolish the hierarchy in the health department Everyone should be promoted to the next level after 5 years  Labour - attendant - nurse - sister - matron - house officer - Residential house officer- medical officer - senior medical officer - registrar- senior registrar- consultant - director general - health Secretary  With 75 years of experience. Unskilled labour can become the health Secretary. they requests the uniform allowance should be 25000. so the sallary goes to 85000 with Ot + 25000=110000 + other allowances(as requests risk allowance)  is this ok for this country?
Poor nurses. They should be paid well. They get only about 70 000 per month. But they work as bout 50 hours per week. I think they should be paid more than Docs and engineers.
Correction , they get approximately 95000 to 120000 ,per month ,yes ,it's not enough , !!

Could you please provide some proof for that salary? Do you know about basic salary & overtime rates of government general nurse? A Nurse who has about 5 years of service only gets around 55,000 salary if she able to do about 200 overtime hours.
Idiot ur salary not just decided by number of hours you work. Then security officer must be the highest paid. Don't type foolish things

agree with Wtf , at present , Sri lankan nurse is paid not only basic +ot , they could claim 14 to 19 different allowances , so their home take salary reaches 90000 ,even exceeds 120000 in most cases , nurses are the second hiest paid group in their training period only after army cadet officers , it reaches approximately 28000 per month at the beginning , e.g. ,19 years old training nurse is paid this allowance from the first month of their training . THE REALITY is not exactly what we can notice from our naked eyes !!!
